data.name: Node.js Wizard
data.title: Back-End Developer (Node.js, NestJS, Typescript, JavaScript, Kubernetes, PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
content: Outsorced to various clients building wide variety of software mainly for for construction, e-learning and consulting industries.
Mostly using either Node.js or NestJS with GrahpQL.

data.name: Salesforce Magnus
data.title: Salesforce developer intern (Javascript, Java, APEX, SOQL, SOSL, REST)
content: Part of a fast-paced team as a salesforce developer intern on a competetive project from real world

It was a bootcamp type training which resulted in choosing the best projects made by interns to have opportunity for full time position in which I did well, but due to finishing only 1st year (compared to people with degrees or in their last semester) and non-remote policy got opportunity to apply once I finish second year.

data.name: University Guildmaster
data.title: Instructional Assistant
content: Helping students understand programming in Java by participating in student-buddy initiative and providing paid tutoring to students from other universities.
